name: Near Bird
description:
💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎
Red Falcon, an influential gangster of these places robbed the central bank of the city "Bird". Investigations have shown that he is hiding somewhere in a settlement near the city and you were sent there on a mission to eliminate him. You will have to find out information about his location by winning duels against his assistants, who are happy to put a couple of the lead in you.

★ Dive into the exciting world of the wild west!
★ Fight against 12 well-trained shooters in a duel and throw a challenge to the Red Falcon himself



- An addictive gameplay
- 12 unique opponents
- Check your agility and reaction speed
- Good soundtrack
